0.1.2.name: wordpress/time-is-money-post-synopsis
0.1.2.description: Please note that this is a beta version. Time is Money Post Synopsis Plugin - This plugin gives the blogger the option to present readers with a synopsized version of their posts. For long posts the author may realize that readers will not want to read the entire post, and might prefer a synopsis. The synopsis may contain a brief version of the article/post, or may contain a bulleted list of the main points within the article or post.
